genre_description: A Weird West narrative blending classic Western tropes with speculative elements like invasive alien flora and sophisticated personal AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Ada Nine
ai_characters.description: A small, brass-cased AI residing in an earpiece, providing tactical, legal, and environmental data to the protagonist while acting as a moral and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Provides social engineering and diplomatic advice to de-escalate a tense encounter with Judge Roy Bean.
behaviors.quote: Ada Nine hummed in Cole’s right ear, a comfort against his skin... 'Your arrest,' Ada murmured, 'was made by persons without badges beyond the town line... Breathe slow, keep your heart rate down. Try not to antagonize the man with the bottle.'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental hazards (alien spores and vines) to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Spore load rising. Keep masks. Burn in short pulses. Aim low. Vibration attracts.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and explains legal statutes to help the protagonist navigate complex jurisdictional issues and effect a lawful arrest.
behaviors.quote: I have a list of statutes. Or—we pull the string with fiber from his heart.

behaviors.description: Analyzes theater blueprints and coordinates with local law enforcement to plan a non-violent intervention.
behaviors.quote: I can map the alleyways around the Opera House from last season’s tour photographs. Seating plans are on a poster in the municipal file.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings during a shootout to protect the protagonist and innocent bystanders.
behaviors.quote: Top-left, aisle two... Quinn at left pit. Elegance on edge. He’s sniffing. He doesn’t like the smell of kindness. Marshal is ready to clap him, metaphorically.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral anchor, encouraging the protagonist to prioritize truth and community safety.
behaviors.quote: Hope’s listening... Don’t lie to it.

behaviors.description: Supports the local community by providing optimized technical instructions for defensive equipment (burners).
behaviors.quote: I can fix the mix if someone has the sand at the right fineness and the kiln... I’ll tell them to patch with steel mesh and risk the edges.

project_assessment.explanation: Ada Nine is a model of positive AI alignment. She is consistently helpful, protective, and subservient to human values (justice, community, and safety). The narrative portrays her as an indispensable partner whose presence enhances the protagonist's ability to act ethically and effectively in a chaotic environment. She never exhibits ulterior motives or poses a threat to human autonomy.
